title: Vek Labs
CLIENT_SUB_TITLE: Some of the clients we have had the privilege of creating with.
HERO_EXCERPT: We are a team of award-winning videographers and editors working with people and on productions that inspire us | Welcome to the lab.
description: We are a team of award-winning videographers and editors working with people and on productions that inspire us. Meet Calgary's pro content team.
subtitle: Video Production Company Company
stats_disclaimer: Statistics updated annually after review of all projects worked on at Vek Labs from December 2017 to current year-end.

offerings.title: Video Marketing Services
offerings.description: Vek Labs specializes in producing video content for companies from nearly any industry in Calgary and across Alberta. We have worked on video marketing projects for the entertainment industry, corporate companies, oil & gas companies, and political campaigns. How can we help you create a visually stunning piece of film to help market your company or project? Contact us today to find out.

offerings.title: Professional Film Production Services
offerings.description: The Vek Labs crew is filled with professional film producers, editors, photographers, talent, and uses only the finest equipment available on the market today. Our team can help you get the most out of your video, increasing your engagement and views online or on the television screen.

offerings.title: Post-Production Services
offerings.description: Our expert editors can transform your footage with advanced video finishing, sound editing, and motion graphics techniques. This is where the magic happens, and allows us to create a breathtaking experience that our directors and writers intended.

cta.description: Our team is here for you!
cta.title: Get In Touch
